message.content:
cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SD, cs.MA, cs.HC 

This paper discusses the challenges and limitations of automated testing tools for mobile apps, which falls under the software engineering (cs.SE) sub-category. The paper also discusses the need for continuous testing and evolution of test cases, which relates to programming languages (cs.PL) and software design (cs.SD). The paper also highlights the importance of considering contextual app states and user experience, which falls under the human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a research agenda for a comprehensive testing framework, which could fall under the mobile applications (cs.MA) sub-category.
